summary: This bill, the "Designate CAIR as a Terrorist Organization Act," directs the Secretary of State to review whether the Council on American-Islamic Relations (CAIR) meets the criteria to be designated as a foreign terrorist organization. The bill cites numerous findings critical of CAIR, including alleged ties to terrorist groups, and calls for a report to Congress summarizing the review's findings and any resulting designation or lack thereof, within 90 days of enactment.
